title: Looking into the bits and pieces of a Micro
brief_description: Provides an introduction to micro computers using non-technical language and shows how the various kinds of hardware and software work together in a computer system. Addresses everything from Central Processing Units (CPU’s) to Random Access Memory (RAM).
